page.title: 07Walking Day
page.content: Lots of towns, especially in the north of England have Walking Days. On Walking Day all the churches in a town Catholic, Anglican, Free Churches, walk through the town together as a procession of witness.Our church which is St. Stephen First Martyr, walk in Warrington Walking Day which takes place on the Friday nearest to the 1st of July every year.The girls in our school wore their school uniform dresses of blue and white gingham dresses, the boys wore their uniform of grey trousers, blue shirt and tie.Every year we have a different headdress. This year we wore white lattice work skull caps. Our school choir also walk in Winwick Walking Day on the Sunday after Warrington's Walking Day. {Continued on next page.
